update supplier_management set Review_results = #{reviewResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Drug_transaction_status = #{drugTransactionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where supply_id = #{supplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
